verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:33
verses.text: And Saul cast a javelin at him to smite him: whereby Jonathan knew that it was determined of his father to slay David.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:34
verses.text: So Jonathan arose from the table in fierce anger, and did eat no meat the second day of the month: for he was grieved for David, because his father had done him shame.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 20:35
verses.text: And it came to pass in the morning, that Jonathan went out into the field at the time appointed with David, and a little lad with him.
